# Figure 1


```{r}
xeno_umap_patients = readRDS("./Figures/xeno_patient_umap.rds")
xeno_umap_treatment = readRDS("./Figures/xeno_treatment_umap.rds")
xeno_deg = readRDS("./Figures/xeno_DEG_GSEA_up.rds")
xeno_sipsic_heatmap = readRDS("./Figures/xeno_sipsic_heatmap.rds")

```


```{r fig.height=15, fig.width=15}
p1 = cowplot::plot_grid(xeno_umap_treatment,xeno_umap_patients,xeno_deg,ncol = 1,nrow = 3,labels = c("B","C","E"))
p2 = cowplot::plot_grid(NULL,xeno_sipsic_heatmap,ncol = 1,nrow = 2,labels = c("A","D"))
p3 = cowplot::plot_grid(p2,p1,nrow = 1,ncol = 2)
p3
```


```{r}
pdf("./final_figures/fig1.pdf",width = 15,height = 15)
p3
dev.off()
```
# Figure 1 sup

```{r fig.height=15, fig.width=15}
patients_patient_id_umap = readRDS("./Figures/patients_patient_id_umap.rds")
patients_treatment_umap = readRDS("./Figures/patients_treatment_umap.rds")
patients_overview = readRDS("./Figures/patients_overview.rds")

xeno_patient_umap = readRDS("./Figures/xeno_patient_umap.rds")
xeno_treatment_umap = readRDS("./Figures/xeno_treatment_umap.rds")
xeno_overview = readRDS("./Figures/xeno_overview.rds")


p1 = cowplot::plot_grid(xeno_patient_umap,xeno_treatment_umap,ncol = 2,nrow = 1,labels = c("A",""))
p2 = cowplot::plot_grid(patients_patient_id_umap,patients_treatment_umap,ncol = 2,nrow = 1,labels = c("B",""))
p3 = cowplot::plot_grid(xeno_overview,patients_overview, ncol = 2,nrow = 1,labels = c("C","D"))
p4 = cowplot::plot_grid(p1,p2,p3, ncol = 1,nrow = 3,rel_heights = c(1,1,0.6))
p4
```


```{r}
pdf("./final_figures/fig1_sup.pdf",width = 15,height = 15)
p4
dev.off()
```
